name: js-utils
description: A collection of JavaScript utilities for common tasks in web development.

scripts.tests: npm run start-server & cypress run --browser chrome && kill $!
scripts.dev-tests: npm run start-server & npm run cypress
scripts.jekyll-build-incremental: npm run copy-build-to-site && jekyll build --source site --destination dist/site --config site/_config.yml --incremental
scripts.jekyll-serve: npm run copy-build-to-site && jekyll serve --port 8080 --source site --destination dist/site --config site/_config.yml --disable-disk-cache -w
scripts.jekyll-build: npm run copy-build-to-site && jekyll build --source site --destination dist/site --config site/_config.yml
scripts.copy-build-to-site: npm run build && cp -R dist/js/* site/assets/js

author: lukov.io/IktaNikuba
